member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructor of a configurable field - Creation of an idLabel - The default type is Text - systemFlag = Standard - creation of the ApsOptions object.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.ToString
member.summary: Returns the concatenation of "Field : Label".

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.IsDirectoryResource(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Get to know if the field is a directory resource.
member.param: The field to be analyzed (FormularField.Name). The name of the field is mandatory because of the system fields: created_by, modified_by and created_by_new.
Dictionary of the options of the field.
member.returns: Returns true when the field is representing a directory resource.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.IsMultiple(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Checks if a field van contain multiple values.
member.param: Dictionnary of the options of the field.
member.returns: Returns true if the options of the field are enclosing the "Multiple" option.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetApsOption(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption},System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption@)
member.summary: Get an option.
member.param: Dictionnary of the options of the field.
Name of the option to retrieve.
Returns the option if existing.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.HasOption(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption},System.String)
member.summary: Checks the existence of an option.
member.param: Dictionnary of the options of the field.
name of the option to be checked.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.FindFieldsInQueryAndReplaceByParams(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns a list of field names in a SQL query and replace $fieldName$ by @fieldName in queryWithParam The field name must be surround by the character $ ex: SELECT * FROM FRM_Ref WHERE Aps_Societe = $Aps_Societe$.
member.param: SQL query.
SQL query with params.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetListValues(Avanteam.Documents.DocumentDocHelper,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption},Avanteam.Kernel.UserInfo)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of .
member.param: Document used by a list coming from a SQL query. Parameter @id in the query or $fieldName$.

The options. The keywords option must: start with SQL=, or @Societes, or be multiple lines of pairs separated by a pipe (|). Otherwise when Keywords option is not provided a Helper option starting by "Field_OpenKeywords(" will be read. Otherwise a pair indicating "Pas de liste" will be returned.
The user from which we will extract Societes if is in the case of "@Societes".

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetListValuesByName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Retourne la liste de valeurs d'une liste via le nom de la liste de valeurs
si readAll = True retourne toutes les valeurs de tous niveaux hiérarchiques sinon retourne les valeurs de premier niveau et liste de valeurs simples.
member.param: Nom de la liste de valeurs.
if True, returns the values of every levels, otherwise only the values of the first level or the simple values.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetListValuesByName(System.String,System.Boolean,Avanteam.Kernel.DataSource.ApplicationProfile)
member.summary: Returns the values of a list of values.
member.param: Name of the list of values.
if True, returns the values of every levels, otherwise only the values of the first level or the simple values.
specify the application profile to be used for the database connection.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetFunctionParameter(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retourne la valeur d’un des paramètres passés à une fonction javascript.
member.param: Le code javascript à parser. C’est un code appelant une fonction qui est attendu.
Position du paramètre à renvoyer (commence à 1).
Retourne la valeur de la chaîne, sans les guillemets délimitrices et sans l’échappement des caractères spéciaux.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.FixHelperCode(System.String)
member.summary: Corrige le code javascript de l’option Helper du champ pour le rendre parsable par la librairie Esprima.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.IsDirectoryPicker(Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField)
member.summary: Détermine si le champ est configuré pour affichier un DirectoryPicker.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetSeparatorMultiple(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Retourne le contenu de l'option Multiple si elle existe et string.Empty si l'option Multiple n'existe pas.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetComputedFormula(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Retourne le script de l'option Computed si elle existe et string.Empty si l'option Computed n'existe pas.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetSqlSize(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Retourne la taille limite SQL si l'option SQLSize existe et -1 si l'option SQLSize n'existe pas.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.IsComputed(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Indique si l'option Computed est présente.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.IsUpperCase(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Avanteam.Formulars.IApsOption})
member.summary: Indique s'il les valeurs doivent être converties en majuscule.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Formulars.FormularField.GetValueListLocalizedText(System.String,System.String[])
